manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kopdkes Professional Wireless Lavalier Lapel Microphone for iPhone, iPad (2 Pack） Do you upset with how to record clear sound when shooting or recording audio/video?Do you feel annoyed when you have any noise in your recordings and don't know how to eliminate it?Are you troubled by the messy wires that fix you in a fixed range and cannot move your body freely during live broadcast? Don't worry anymore This wireless microphone is featured high-sensitive sound pickup mic components, which help the microphone capture your voice with a high sample rate and restores your voice without any distortion.With an advanced chipset that transmits in the 2.4 GHz, wireless lavalier microphone enables interference-free, stable, and low-latency wireless transmission up to 65ft.

Plug & Play Step 1: Plug the receiver into your devices Step 2: Power on the microphones. Connected Success Get rid of messy cable! No Need App/Bluetooth! The wireless lapel lavalier microphones can be clipped on the collar to free your hands for audio video recording. Superior Noise Reduction The omnidirectional wireless lavalier microphone is built with professional-grade intelligent noise reduction chips, providing effective identification of the original sound and clear recording in a noisy environment.

One-key Operation, Easy to Use Pause Record Press the Power button for 1 second, Green Light on the microphone flashes Back to Record Press Power again for 1 second, Green Light on microphone steady on Disconnected Mode If your phone is locked, the transmitter and the receiver may disconnect.​ If this happens, please follow the steps.​ 1. Unplug the receiver, turn off the microphone.​2. Reconnect it to your phone and turn on the microphone. Please follow up the instructions step by step and we will always stand by if you have any problems while recording.

8H Long Working Time Build in 100MAH rechargeable safety battery, the lav mic can keep working for up to 8 hours and about 1 hour of charging time. Charging while Recording Just plug your phone charger into the interface port of the receiver, and the mobile phone can be charged through the interface. Package includes 2 x Wireless Microphone1 x IOS Receiver1 x 2 in 1 Charging Cable1 x User manual1 x Exquisite gift box

NOTICE The receiver is only compatible with the IOS device lightning port, not suit for type-C devicesThe wireless lavalier microphones don't support phone calls and online chattingThe wireless lapel microphones don't support music output while recording video

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Kopdkes wireless microphone, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations. The microphone offers impressive performance and delivers clear, crisp sound quality throughout my presentations and performances.One of the standout features of the Kopdkes wireless microphone is its reliable connectivity. It quickly establishes a strong and stable connection with the receiver, ensuring minimal dropouts or interference. I appreciate the wireless range, which allows me to move around freely without compromising the audio quality.The microphone itself is well-designed and feels comfortable to hold. The build quality is sturdy, and it gives a premium impression. The battery life is impressive, lasting for several hours on a single charge, which is great for extended use during events.Setting up the Kopdkes wireless microphone was a breeze. The included instructions were clear and easy to follow. The receiver is compact and straightforward, with intuitive controls for adjusting volume levels and choosing different channels. Additionally, the microphone automatically pairs with the receiver, simplifying the initial setup process.While the overall performance of the Kopdkes wireless microphone is excellent, there is room for improvement in terms of range. In larger venues or outdoor settings, the signal strength can weaken at longer distances from the receiver. However, this can be mitigated by ensuring a clear line of sight between the microphone and receiver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ⭐️ Good Value for the Price ⭐️
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Kopdkes 2 Pack Wireless Lavalier Microphone for iPhone iPad, and overall, I found them to be a decent option, especially considering their affordable price. While they offer satisfactory performance, there is one notable drawback that needs mentioning.First and foremost, the microphones provide good value for the price. They are wireless and specifically designed for use with iPhones and iPads, which is convenient for content creators, vloggers, or anyone in need of a portable audio solution. The sound quality is respectable, delivering clear and crisp audio for various applications.The fact that the package includes two microphones is a definite advantage. This allows for flexibility in recording interviews, conversations, or multiple speakers simultaneously. It's a practical feature, particularly for those involved in professional projects or situations that require multiple audio inputs.However, it's important to note that the battery life of these microphones leaves something to be desired. They tend to drain relatively quickly, requiring frequent recharging. This can be a bit frustrating, especially during longer recording sessions or when you're on the go and don't have immediate access to a power source.Despite this limitation, if you're mindful of battery usage and plan accordingly, the Kopdkes Wireless Lavalier Microphones can still serve you well. Just be prepared to keep an eye on the battery level and have a backup power source nearby to ensure uninterrupted recording sessions.In summary, for their price point, the Kopdkes 2 Pack Wireless Lavalier Microphones offer decent performance and are suitable for many applications. While the battery life may be a bit of a drawback, with some extra planning and preparation, they can still be a valuable addition to your audio recording toolkit.

reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love my wireless microphone. It is so simple to use and the sound quality is amazing. It has really taken my Youtube videos to another level.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best wireless microphones
reviews.reviewText: My HS cheerleaders used these for game day videos. They were so much fun and captured great sound. Perfect for what we needed them for. They worked great with an iPhone and held a charge for several hours. I highly recommend and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but not for music at all
reviews.reviewText: These are amazing, but I'm returning them and knocking off a star because the seller seems to want to suggest that these can be used for music and they just can't. To be fair, for voice they're quite amazing. They connect instantly, cancel noise well and capture your voice clearly without snaps, pops, gain or nasally tone. They are sturdy yet nearly weightless and connected to my phone immediately without issue. If you want to record just voice, for interviews, podcasts, etc, etc, buy these now. I wouldn't expect anything to be noticeably better until you're in the $100+ range. For the price they're a fantastic value and you will probably want for nothing.But I was looking for something to record music. And I searched "wireless microphone for music". And this was the first hit. And it had people singing and playing guitar in the description. But it was all just nonsense, because they don't work for this at all. Instruments output too many frequencies for the noise cancellation to handle. So it goes crazy trying to latch on to frequencies and ends up just doing this weird phasing thing that completely distorts the sound. Even an acoustic guitar from across the room sounds smooshed and mangled. So not only can these not record music, but they literally turn music into anti-music. As such I'm completely conflicted between loving these things for their amazing value, and hating them for not being the thing that Amazon and the seller tried to convince me they were. I def recommend these for any voice applications. But do not be fooled into thinking you can use them for music in any way.
I had an issue with my product and it was solved within an hour contacting the seller! In a virtual world, this is super important. Thank you!
